question: 遠距離
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>far</kanji> <kanji>distance</kanji> <kanji>detach</kanji>ment is a distance that is far. It is <vocabulary>long distance</vocabulary>. Also remember that <ja>距離</ja> is a "distance" so a far distance is a <vocabulary>long distance</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
